solution_line_template: 40% of the {total_audience} studio audience will have an envelope under their chair so {envelope_percent_decimal}*{total_audience} = <<{total_audience}*{envelope_percent_decimal}={people_with_envelope}>>{people_with_envelope} people will find an envelope

20% of these {people_with_envelope} people will find a "You Won" notice so only {win_percent_decimal}*{people_with_envelope} = <<{win_percent_decimal}*{people_with_envelope}={winners}>>{winners} people will win
